headline: HCA Healthcare Names Wendy Warren as Senior Vice President and Chief Ethics and Compliance Officer
summary: NASHVILLE, Tenn., December 20, 2024--HCA Healthcare, Inc. (NYSE:HCA), one of the nation’s leading healthcare providers, today announced that Wendy Warren, a more than 10-year veteran of HCA Healthcare, has been appointed senior vice president and chief ethics and compliance officer, effective March 3, 2025. Warren succeeds Kathi Whalen, who is retiring after 27 years with the company.
